name: salesforce-cli
description: Connect Claude to your Salesforce orgs via the Salesforce CLI. Query data, deploy metadata, run Apex, manage users, and more across multiple orgs.
long_description:
A desktop extension that gives Claude direct access to the Salesforce CLI (`sf`). Built for consulting teams that manage multiple Salesforce orgs.

Features:
- Multi-org support with alias-based targeting
- SOQL queries and SOSL searches
- CRUD and bulk data operations
- Metadata retrieval and deployment
- Apex execution and testing
- Schema exploration
- User and permission management
- REST API access

Requires the Salesforce CLI (`sf`) to be installed and at least one org authenticated via `sf org login web`.
